source: Exit <var 29 EB39 /var>?
target: 「<var 29 EB39 /var>」から脱出しますか？

source: Exit alone.
target: 1人で脱出

source: Exit with party.
target: パーティで脱出

source: Remain here.
target: キャンセル

source: Defeat <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>
target: <var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>の撃破

source: Duty Progress
target: コンテンツ進行度

source: Leave duty?
target: コンテンツから退出します

source:
Select a destination.
Current Location: <var 29 EA02 /var>
target:
どこに移動しますか？
現在地：<var 29 EA02 /var>

source: Starting Point
target: 開始地点

source: Cancel
target: やめる

source: An exit has appeared.
target: 脱出地点が出現した

source: guildhest
target: ギルドオーダー

source: Cultist rosary
target: 邪教の念珠を入手

source: Cultist orbs destroyed
target: 邪教の宝珠の破壊

source: Sealed barrier broken
target: 封印結界の消滅

source: You seem surprised. Did you not cross our gates in search of blood?
target:
血の復讐を求め「門」を開いた愚者は、
貴様ではないようだな……まぁ、よいわ。

source: Come hither, children of the dawn. The undying master will drink deep tonight!
target:
事のついでだ……貴様の脳髄を啜り、
その精神の味を楽しむとしようぞ！

source: Tiny Keys
target: 小さな鍵所持数

source: Find the bloody parchment
target: 血文字の紙片を入手

source: Find the green key
target: 宿り木の鍵を入手

source: Find the yellow key
target: 黄撫子の鍵を入手

source: Photocells
target: 魔導フォトセルの所持数

source: Activate confession chamber terminal
target: 裸者の広間の魔導ターミナルの作動

source: Open the abacination chamber door
target: 拷問の間の扉の開放

source: Activate the Fool's Rest terminal
target: 愚者の広間の魔導ターミナルの作動

source: The guildhest is complete! Come and collect your reward.
target:
任務完了を確認した！
報酬を受け取りに来てくれ。

source: Eliminate all targets.
target: 敵をせん滅

source: Slay <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>.
target: <var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>を討伐

source: Capture <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>.
target: <var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>の捕獲

source: Escort <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 02E8020202 /var> to the specified location.
target: <var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>を目的地まで護衛

source: A fine display! Now come, collect your reward.
target:
よーし、任務完了だ！
報酬を渡すから、こっちに集まっとくれ。

source:
Done, are we?
Then haul your bloody arses over here so's we can leave this awful place!
target:
お疲れさん、任務達成を確認したよ！
それじゃ、報酬を受け取りに来てちょうだい。

source: That was...adequate. Back to me, adventurer.
target:
ハハハハ！　やるじゃないか！
さあ、勝利を祝して報酬を渡すよ！

source: You've a knack for this, haven't you? 'Twas as if I were watching myself, ten summers past!
target:
見事な働きぶりだ！
さあ、報酬を受け取りに来てくれ。

source: Defeat one enemy group at a time.
target: 敵集団をひとつずつ打ち破れ

source: If <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> spots you, he will order all remaining targets to attack. Stay out of his line of sight and tackle his minions one at a time.
target:
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>に発見されると
すべての敵に攻撃される
視界に注意しつつ
周囲の魔物を各個撃破せよ

source: If <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> spots you, he will order all remaining targets to attack. Stay out of his line of sight and tackle his minions one at a time.
target:
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>に発見されると
すべての敵に攻撃される
視界に注意しつつ、周囲の魔物を各個撃破せよ

source: Steady there! Only a fool with a death wish would engage both parties at once!
target:
アンタたち、焦るんじゃないよ！
ひとつずつ敵集団を処理するんだ！

source: Don't be so bloody eager to march headlong into peril! Try luring the beasts away from the goobbue without alarming the mossy lout.
target:
敵増援が出現！　警戒する敵には、
うかつに手を出すんじゃないよ！

source: Executed to perfection! Now put the seedkin down!
target:
その調子だ！　グゥーブーに気づかれずに、
ザコを始末するなんて、やるじゃないか！

source: The goobbue has seen you and alerted his scrags! Slay as many as you can before jumpin' in bed with the giant, or you won't survive another bell!
target:
グゥーブーに気付かれちまった！
ほかのザコを倒して、頭数を減らすんだ！

source: Get up! You won't do your allies any good lying sprawled across the grass like a beached whale!
target:
倒れてる場合じゃないぞ！
さあ、立ち上がって戦列に復帰するんだ！

source: What in the seven hells are you fools doing!? Fall back and regroup!
target:
見てられないね！
さあ、落ち着いて態勢を立て直すんだ！

source: Might be I was mistaken about you all. I'd say your chances of victory are a notch above dismal.
target:
なかなか、タフな相手だが、
その調子で押しまくれ！

source: You've come this far, now finish him!
target:
奴も追い詰められているようだぞ！
このまま一気にトドメを刺すんだ！

source: When threatened, <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> will summon reinforcements. Stay alert!
target:
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>は増援を呼ぶ
役割分担して対処せよ

source: Beware of <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>'s new weaponskill.
target: <var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>の攻撃方法が増えた。警戒しつつ戦え

source: Beware of <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>'s new weaponskill.
target: <var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>の攻撃方法がさらに増えた。警戒しつつ戦え

source: The stronger of your allies would be wise to draw the enemy's attention away from the weaker.
target: 体力が高い者は敵の注意を引きつけろ！

source: Those allies specialized in dealing damage will find their attacks more effective when dealt from the enemy's flank or rear.
target: 攻撃役は、敵の側面や後方に回り込め！

source: Reinforcements! Move to intercept!
target: 敵の増援が現れたぞ！

source: Another wave! But unlike the last!
target: また増援だ！　さっきまでと違う奴がいるぞ！

source: Defeat <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020302 /var> to open the first gate.
target: <var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>をせん滅し、関門を開け

source: Defeat the enemies and use the lever to open the gate.
target: 敵をせん滅して安全を確保し、レバーを操作して関門を開け

source: Defeat <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> before the yarzons break free.
target: 迅速に<var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>を倒せ

source: Behind you! Slay the lesser enemies before concentrating your efforts on the true threat.
target:
おっと、背後からも敵がきたぞ！
弱いレミューから叩いて、頭数を減らしな！

source: Pull the lever and open the gate!
target: さあ、レバーを引いて関門を開けな！

source: Quickly! Those boulders will not hold the yarzons back for long!
target:
何をモタモタしてるんだい！　右の岩壁から、
ヤーゾン共が這い出てきそうだよ！

source: There to the left of the gate! A second swarm of yarzons has appeared! Hurry and fell the gigantoad or you will have the vilekin to deal with, as well.
target:
またまたヤーゾン共のお出ましだよ！
さあ、とっととカエルをツブしちまいな！

source: A swarm of yarzons has broken through! Your attention is best focused on clearing away the six-legged vilekin before returning to the gigantoad.
target:
さあ、ヤーゾン共がおいでなすったよ！
先に奴らを始末するんだ！

source: A second swarm approaches quickly! Ready yourselves!
target:
また、お客さんが到着だ！
ヤーゾン共から倒さないとジリ貧だよ！

source: A superb display of strength and speed! Well done!
target:
やるじゃないか！
いい速攻戦術を見せてもらったよ！

source: The boulders are beginning to crack!
target:
岩壁が崩されそうだぞ！
このままでは、ヤーゾン共に突破される！

source: The boulders will crumble at any moment, allowing the yarzons entry!
target:
また岩壁が崩されそうだ！
ヤーゾン共の出現に備えよ！

source: Now pull the lever to open the gate...but only when you are ready for what waits on the other side.
target:
よし、安全確保を確認したら、
レバーを探して操作しな！

source: My orders are to aid you to victory. You only make it harder on yourselves by disregarding them.
target:
レミューを片付けろと言ったはずだが、
なんて強引な連中なんだい。

source: Now that those two are out of the way, concentrate your efforts on the hog.
target:
いいぞ、レミューを先に始末したのが、
功を奏したようだね！

source: Something tells me there will be more if you cannot make swift work of that toad.
target:
ヤーゾン共をはね除けたようだね！
だが、気を抜くなよ！

source: The first gate is open! Tend to your wounds before advancing to the second.
target:
関門が開いたぞ！
準備を整え、前進せよ！

source: The second gate is open! One more, and you will have breached the gigantoad's lair.
target:
よし、二番目の関門が開いたぞ！
さあ、進め、進め！

source: The third gate has fallen! The lord of the lair awaits beyond!
target:
よし、三番目の関門も突破だ！
いよいよ次が最後だよ！

source: The safety mechanism on the gate will deactivate once all threats in the area have been removed.
target:
プークを全部倒すんだ！
そうすりゃ、関門が開くよ！

source: <var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020302 /var>)) /var> will attempt to heal <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8030202 /var>.
target: <var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>は、<var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80301 /var>の体力を回復する

source: Use fire sprite cores to light the herb patch and release slumber-inducing smoke into the air.
target: ファイアスプライトを倒すと入手できる核を使えば、香草に着火し睡眠ガスを発生させられる

source: Your orders are to capture the gil turtle. The best manner in which to accomplish this task is by first weakening the poor creature.
target:
任務の目的は、ギルガメの捕獲だ！
まずは、やっこさんを弱らせるんだよ！

source: The craven bandits who spirited away the turtle would not have you reclaim their prize, and will heal the creature's wounds with hopes that their efforts will discourage you into leaving. Draw the turtle away from the conjurers.
target:
盗賊どもが回復してるよ！
ギルガメを、こっちに誘い出すんだ！

source: In its current weakened state, the gil turtle will be unable to resist the effects of the herbs. Now quickly! We require fire sprite cores!
target:
ギルガメは、十分弱らせたようだね！
ファイアスプライトから核を採るんだ！

source: Use the core to light the herb patch lying before me.
target:
ファイアスプライトの核で、
アタイの目の前の香草に着火するんだ！

source: The herbs are aflame! Now do what you must to draw the gil turtle into the smoke!
target:
いいぞ、催眠ガスが煙ってきた！
ギルガメを、はやく連れ込むんだよ！

source: And so the gentle giant succumbs to slumber's blissful embrace. Our work here is complete.
target:
おやすみ、ギルガメちゃん！
これで任務完了だよ！

source: Those efts may prove troublesome if left alone. Slay the wavekin before the situation becomes problematic.
target:
何だい？　想定外の魔物だよ！
邪魔されちゃ叶わない、倒しちまいな！

source: Out of cores? Well then claim new ones! You'd think that much was obvious!
target:
ファイアスプライトの核が切れたって？
それなら、もう一度取るまでだよ！

source:
Stay your blades!
The client specifically stated that he wished his pet returned alive!
target:
ちょっと、ギルガメを殺すつもりかい？
生け捕りできないと任務失敗なんだよ！

source: You blundering half-wits! Now what are we to tell Lord Adeledji!
target:
なんてことだい……
ギルガメが、死んじまったじゃないか！

source: The smoke will have little effect on the turtle while in his current condition.
target:
元気があるうちは、寝やしないよ！
もっと弱らせてから、睡眠ガスを吸わせな！

source: Releasing the smoke now would be useless. I shall tend to the herbs while you see to the gil turtle.
target:
香草を燃やすにははやいよ。
まずはギルガメを弱らせるんだ！

source: Fire sprite cores
target: ファイアスプライトの核 所持数

source: Silence those bandits!
target:
盗賊共が動き出したよ！
さっさと蹴散らしちまいな！

source: Lure enemies away from the ruptured pollen clusters before engaging them.
target: 毒花粉霧の内側に入らないように戦え

source: Stay clear of the ruptured pollen clusters when engaging enemies.
target: 毒花粉霧の位置に注意しつつ動き回る敵を倒せ

source: If inhaled the pollen will set fire to your lungs and sap your strength. Draw the creatures a safe distance from the noisome mist and then engage.
target:
妖花の毒花粉霧に気をつけろ！
安全な場所に、敵を誘き出して叩け！

source: Do not let down your guard. The battle has only just begun.
target:
いい調子だ！
このまま妖花を誘き出せ！

source: It may take some coercing to draw that one from the mist.
target:
毒花粉霧が立ち込める場所に入るなよ！
敵を上手く誘導するんだ！

source: Leave the mist at once! You will need all your strength to defeat these horrors of the wood!
target:
毒花粉霧が立ちこめる場所にいると、
体力を奪われるぞ！　はやく逃れるんだ！

source: Maneuver clear of the raining pollen clusters lest you find yourself caught in their mist!
target:
こちらを狙って毒花粉霧を噴いてくるぞ！
毒花粉が舞う場所を見極めて移動しろ！

source: The wind! It carries away the mist! The Matron smiles upon us!
target:
時間が経てば、
毒花粉霧は散るようだな……

source: The mist, it returns!
target:
妖花が毒花粉霧を噴いたぞ！
うかつに近づくな！

source:
The creature has left the pollen mist!
Now is your chance! Strike it down!
target:
その調子で、毒花粉霧から、
敵を引き離しながら戦うんだ！

source: Your foe weakens with every blow you land! Do not let up!
target:
いいぞ、押している！
そうやって安全を確保しながら戦うんだ！

source: Yes! I do believe you have him! It won't be much longer now!
target:
戦い方が分かってきたようじゃないか！
いけるぞ、押しまくれッ！

source: Defeat the roaming bandits before engaging the stationary targets.
target:
一度に多数の敵を相手にするのは危険だ
巡回する賊を各個撃破せよ

source: Beware of reinforcements.
target: 敵の増援を警戒せよ

source: Prevent the conjurers from healing their wounded companions.
target: ヒーラーの幻術士を優先的に狙え

source: Redbellies! To me!
target: 者ども、戦いだッ！　加勢しろッ！

source: My wounds! Someone see to my wounds!
target: クソッ！　ケアルができる奴、手を貸せッ！

source: Where are all my men!?
target: クソクソクソッ！　誰でもいい早く来いッ！

source: Ware the scouts, for they will alert their brethren of your presence.
target: 巡回している賊に注意しろ！

source: The swarmpoint has summoned reinforcements! Locate them immediately!
target:
賊共のリーダーは増援を呼ぶ！
常に周囲を警戒するのだ！

source: Their conjurers will spell your end. Silence the casters so that there are none who might heal the swarmpoint.
target:
賊共の増援に注意せよ！
特に回復を行う者は要警戒だ！

source: Keep your eyes open for roaming bandits who will join the fray! Remember this when situating your battles.
target:
巡回中の敵に見つかると乱戦になる！
離れた位置で、戦うのだ！

source: Without their conjurers to heal them, you should make quick work of the others.
target:
回復魔法の使い手を優先的に叩け！
放置すれば、戦いが長引くぞ！

source: The swarmpoint is known for his unmatchable strength. Send your hardiest allies to bear the brunt of his might while the others slowly drain his vitality.
target:
盗賊のリーダーは、かなりの使い手だ！
盾役が引き付け、強力な攻撃を受け止めろ！

source:
Reinforcements!
See to the conjurers before your efforts are rendered to naught.
target:
増援が呼ばれたようだ！
回復魔法の使い手は、最優先で叩け！

source: Another unit! You know what you must do!
target:
さらに増援が出現！
油断せず、対応せよ！

source: Not all their spellweavers are masters of the curative arts. Learn to distinguish the healers from the rest!
target:
どいつが回復魔法の使い手か
見極めつつ、確実に叩くのだ！

source: Lo! There is a conjurer in your midst! Find the cur and slay him!
target:
標的の回復を確認ッ！
回復魔法の使い手を見極めろ！

source: Use the guild-issue items to your advantage.
target: 支援物資のアイテムを有効活用せよ

source: Take care not to succumb to the enfeebling effects of the charmed creatures' attacks.
target:
敵の多彩な攻撃によりさまざまなステータス異常になる
警戒しつつ戦え

source: Beware the enfeebling properties of Briaxio's attacks.
target: ステータス異常に注意しつつ夢幻のブラキシオを倒せ

source: Reinforcements called
target: 敵増援の出現回数

source: Beware! The foul poisons of these creatures will disrupt your humours and send your body into fits.
target:
対象の特殊攻撃に注意せよ！
体調の変化には気を配るのだ！

source: Do not let the poisons overwhelm you! Use the time between battles to purge the toxins from your veins.
target:
よし、順調に進んでいるぞ！
引き続き、敵の特殊攻撃に注意せよ！

source: Confirm that each of your allies knows his role. One misstep could mean a man poisoned, paralyzed...or worse!
target:
各員の役割分担を確認しつつ
侵攻ルート上の敵を、着実に排除せよ！

source: Use the spell Esuna to your advantage! And if that fails you, a good old antidote will often do the trick.
target:
体調に変化が生じた場合は、
直ちに「エスナ」で治療せよ！

source: Without an ally to draw his magicks away from the others, Briaxio will unleash his bane on all of you!
target:
夢幻のブラキシオを確認した！
盾役はその務めを果たし、味方を守り抜け！

source: Briaxio's followers have rushed to his aid! Send several of your allies to drive off the reinforcements while those remaining keep Briaxio under control.
target:
敵増援の出現を確認！
攻撃役の出番だ、応戦せよ！

source: Destroy the goblins' makeshift barricades and continue up the Matron's Lethe.
target: ゴブリンたちが築いたバリケードを破壊し、突破せよ

source: Avoid Stikflix Grumblytoss's bombs.
target:
仏頂面のスティックフリックスが投げる爆弾の
爆発に巻き込まれないように戦え

source: The goblins hide behind their barricades. You must destroy these obstacles to reach them. However, be always aware of their bombs.
target:
ゴブリン族の爆弾に注意しつつ、
バリケードを破壊せよ！

source: The bombs wielded by Stikflix Grumblytoss are much deadlier and have a greater blast radius than those used by his ragtag army.
target:
仏頂面のスティックフリックスの爆弾は、
広範囲を爆破する！　警戒せよ！

source: Remember your roles within the party and communicate with your allies. Those are the keys to victory!
target:
各員の役割分担を確認しつつ
侵攻ルート上の敵を、着実に排除せよ！

source: If a bomb is tossed your way, do not panic. Simply retreat until it detonates and then return to the front lines.
target:
バリケードをたたき壊せ！
ただし、敵の爆弾には気をつけろよ！

source: I shall give the goblins credit where credit is due. It must have taken them a half-turn of the sun to drag these crates into place... Now demolish them!
target:
二重にバリケードが張り巡らされている！
だが、やるべき事は同じだ！　叩き壊せ！

source: The first station is toppled, but another lies near the top of the heavenspillar. Forward, adventurers!
target:
いいぞ、よくやった！
引き続き警戒しつつ、進軍せよ！

source: The goblins' leader, Stikflix Grumblytoss, awaits ahead! Give him no quarter!
target:
よくやった！
残るは仏頂面のスティックフリックスのみだ！

source: Stikflix Grumblytoss may not appear to be the most formidable of foes, but his realm-shaking explosives make him a force to be reckoned with. If one happens to land in your vicinity, you would take my advice and run.
target:
奴は、大型の爆弾を所持している！
その威力は計り知れん、確実に回避せよ！

source: Rotten jam will emerge from the stale bubbles if ignored. Burst them before they burst on their own.
target:
ロトンバブルを放置すると
ロトンジャムが出現する
確実に叩き割れ

source: When burst, acid bubbles will emit a harmful, corrosive liquid. Avoid attacking them at all costs.
target:
アシッドバブルを攻撃すると
周囲に酸液が飛散する
うかつに手を出すな

source: Rotten jam! That's why I warned you to burst the stale bubbles. Now you have that <var 1A 02 /var>thing<var 1A 01 /var> to deal with!
target: くそッ！　ロトンジャムが現れやがった！

source: That wasn't so hard now, was it?
target:
いいぞ、その調子で叩き割れ！
不潔な魔物が生まれる前にな！

source:
What did the damn morbol do, pass wind!?
See to the bubbles afore they see to you!
target:
何てこったい！
大量の泡の出現を確認！　注意しろ！

source:
I reckon you've done this before.
That was some proper combat, if I do say so meself.
target:
不潔な魔物を一匹も生まれさせないとは、
やるじゃないか！

source: What are you fixing to do? Get us all killed?
target:
アシッドバブルに手を出すな！
酸液が飛び散り、被害が出るぞ！

source: Not another! Just the smell alone is enough to make a man retch! Do away with the thing, would you?
target:
またもや不潔な魔物のお出ましだ！
ロトンバブルの処理を怠るな！

source: The stale bubbles, not the acid bubbles, you mud-brained dullard!
target:
アシッドバブルに手を出すな！
刺激すると酸液が飛び散るぞ！

source: Send the damned thing back to the hell it slithered up from!
target:
あと一歩で、いける！
総員、全力攻撃だ！！

source: Good eyes, adventurers! Good eyes!
target:
よし、その調子で
ロトンバブルを処理していくんだ！

source: Not the most pleasant buggers to fight, are they? Maybe next time you'll heed me words and burst the bubbles first.
target:
魔物を処理できたようだが……
次はロトンバブルを先に叩けよ！

source: See the bastard's vines start to twitch? The creature grows weak!
target:
モルボルが弱ってきているぞ！
気を抜かず、攻撃を続行せよ！

source: Leave them stale bubbles be, and from them'll drop a dollop of rancid ooze almost as foul as me ma's gruel. If you don't want to see that happen, burst the bubbles quick.
target:
ロトンバブルを放置すれば、
不潔な魔物が生まれ落ちるぞ！　叩き割れ！

source: Buso draws his strength from the blue flames. Extinguish the flames to make him more susceptible to your attacks.
target: 蒼き炎によりブソは強化される。蒼き炎を調べて消しつつ戦え

source: A new blue flame will appear where <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 02E8020202 /var> is slain. Choose your battles.
target:
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>を討伐すると
その場に蒼き炎が灯る
倒すタイミングを考えろ

source: If you are branded with Buso's Mark of Pain, distance yourself from your allies so that they are not caught in the Dark Dome.
target:
ブソのダークドームに狙われた際は、
巻き込まないように味方から離れろ

source: Those horrible blue flames─they're the aetherial traces of slain voidsent. Our Lifestream won't have the stuff, so the essence remains trapped in the corporeal realm. Buso taps that essence...
target:
見ろ、異界ヴォイドの蒼き炎が
妖異ブソに力を与えている！

source: You cannot slay a void hound without it leaving behind a flame. If you are to cull the beasts, be ready to deal swiftly with the consequences of your actions.
target:
ヴォイド・ハウンドを倒すと、蒼き炎が灯るぞ！
消火の準備を整えてから、倒すのだ！

source: Buso readies the Mark of Pain! Once marked, you cannot escape the fate you are dealt...but you can spare your allies!
target:
ブソが何かを狙っている！
狙われた者は、味方から離れるんだ！

source:
Go! Smother the blue flames!
It's the only way to see Buso weakened!
target:
蒼き炎を消火すれば、
ブソに注ぎ込まれる力を打ち消せるぞ！

source:
Damn! Another blue flame is lit!
Buso grows stronger every moment he basks in its unholy light!
target:
ええい、また蒼き炎が灯ったぞ！
ブソの力が増してしまう。逃さず消すのだ！

source:
Rise up, adventurer!
This battle is not yet lost! Remember the blue flames!
target:
蒼き炎をすべて消すのだ！
そうしなければブソの力を削げんぞ！

source: Only one flame remains! Quickly! See it out!
target:
あと少しだ！　蒼き炎さえ消せば、
ブソの力を削ぎ落とせるはずなのだ！

source:
Now is your chance!
Tear the fiend limb from limb...from limb from limb!
target:
ブソの力が弱まったぞ！
今こそ好機！　攻勢に転じるのだ！

source: Buso seeks to mark those allies who douse his flames!
target:
チッ、ブソは蒼き炎を消そうとする者を、
狙ってくるようだぞ！　注意しろ！

source:
One of you has been marked!
For Twelve's sake and the sake of the others, run!
target:
ダークドームの効果は広範囲に及ぶ！
狙われた者は、味方から離れるのだ！

source: Thrust him back into the void!
target:
ブソの体力も限界が近いようだな！
このまま押し切るんだ！

source: Draw Buso away from the blue flames before extinguishing them!
target: ブソを蒼き炎から離して戦え！

source: Meet a Longstop ally
target: 野営地の住人の発見

source: Access Brayflox's Runstop
target: 「ブレイフロクスの避難地」への進路確保

source: Access Mudstop Watergush
target: 「泥濘の水源地」への進路確保

source: Arrive in the heart of the Longstop
target: 「ブレイフロクスの野営地」へ到達

source: Clear the Hall of the Cesti
target: 「拳闘の間」の突破

source: Activate the chain winches
target: 鉄鎖のウインチの作動

source: Clear the Hall of the Secutores
target: 「剣闘の間」の突破

source: Defeat Tangata
target: 獣闘士 タンガタの撃破

source: Activate the coral trigger
target: 珊瑚の仕掛けの作動

source: Open the hidden door
target: 隠し扉の開放

source: Discover the pirate captain
target: 海賊船長の発見

source: Obtain the Waverider Gate key
target: 海人門の鍵を入手

source: Pshhh! Finleshhh fools!
target:
フスィーッ……。
海神様の潮流に抗う愚かな「ヒレナシ」よ！

source: The Lord of the Whorl shhhall sssup upon your sssouls!
target:
我がアギトで噛み砕き
海の藻屑にしてくれようぞ！！

source: My flames shall consume thy flesh and soul both!
target: 勇猛無比……我が力を思い知るがいい！

source: Succumb to the Inferno!
target: 力戦奮闘……されど我が敵にあらず！

source: Surrender thyself to the fires of judgment!
target: 兵貴神速……「炎獄の楔」にて、この者へ裁きを！

source: Thy soul shall burn for eternity!
target: 永遠偉大……我が「地獄の火炎」に焼かれよ！

source: Thou art strong, mortal!
target: 正々堂々……我が敵に相応しい！

source: The blessing of Light...defies me!?
target: 不倶戴天……その祝福……もしや光の……！？

source: Six-onze pinches of firesand
target: 6オンズ爆薬の所持数

source: Clear shaft B4 of rubble
target: 「B4坑道」の落石を除去

source: Clear shaft E1 of rubble
target: 「再開発区E1坑道」の落石を除去

source: Arrive in shaft E2
target: 「再開発区E2坑道」へ到達

source: MASTERS MUST PAY! MASTERS MUST DIE!
target:
オデたちをトジコメたワルモノに……。
ワルモノに……フクシュウををを……。

source: NEVER AGAIN! NEVER!
target:
オマエラ……ワルモノさツブして……。
イジゾクにジユウををを！！！

source: Clear Still Waters
target: 水上庭園を突破

source: Unlock the sealed gate
target: 仕掛け扉を開放

source: Climb the Endless Rise
target: 無限回廊を突破

source: Clear the Final Ease
target: 旅人の安息所を突破

source: Obtain lantern oil
target: ランタンオイル所持数

source: Breach the Lock
target: 守衛の詰所を突破

source: Defeat the morbol bed keeper
target: モルボルの苗床を除去

source: Clear the Coincounter's Chest
target: 徴税人の金庫を突破

source: Defeat the morbol bed keepers
target: モルボルの苗床を除去

source: Open the grand hall gate
target: 応門の扉の開放

source: Clear the feasting hall
target: 衛兵食房の突破

source: Deactivate the level IV magitek field
target: 魔導フィールドⅣの開放

source: Engage the shadowclaw.
target: 敵増援に警戒しつつ戦え

source: Avoid the invincible <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 04E8020202 /var> and focus your attacks on the shadowclaw.
target:
巡回する<var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>は無敵だ
範囲攻撃を放つため、接近を避けろ

source: Avoid the invincible <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 04E8020202 /var> and focus your attacks on the shadowclaw.
target:
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>は出現と消滅を繰り返す
倒すことはできないため、戦闘を避けろ

source: Avoid the invincible <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 04E8020202 /var> and focus your attacks on the shadowclaw.
target:
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>は不規則に移動する
移動先を確認して、接触を避けろ

source: <var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>)) /var> is all you need be concerned with. Shut all else out.
target: <var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>が目標だ。心してかかれ！

source: <var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 02E8020202 /var>)) /var>... Ware his attacks, but do not let the fiend lure you from your objective.
target:
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>が現れたぞ！
飛び回る奴から離れつつ、討伐目標を攻撃せよ！

source: <var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020302 /var>)) /var> wander 'twixt this realm and theirs, appearing only for a few moments. Pay them no heed, and they will pay you none in turn. Draw too close, and...
target:
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>は神出鬼没だ！
消えたからって、油断するんじゃないよ！

source: Do not be lured in by <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>'s dance. Keep your distance and keep your head.
target:
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>の動きが読めん！
臨機応変に立ち位置を変えるんだよ！

source: Can you not see your blows to <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> have no effect? Avoid its attacks and concentrate your efforts on the shadowclaw.
target:
結界を張る<var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>に攻撃は無意味だ！
距離を取って、奴の攻撃を回避しな！

source: <var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>)) /var>'s magicks can smother the field of battle. Stay light on your feet.
target:
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>の攻撃範囲は広い！
巻き込まれんように、距離を取りな！

source: Watch carefully. Order can be discovered in the shadows' movements, if you would but seek it.
target:
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>の出現位置を予測しな！
離れておけば、無駄な戦いを避けられるよ！

source: You are doing well. The beast weakens.
target: 効いてるぞ！　その調子で攻めるんだよ！

source: There is little life left in this one, but do not let down your guard. The battle is far from over.
target: だいぶ弱ってきたな！　もう一息だよ！

source: Never before have I seen such mastery of the battlefield. You have far exceeded my expectations, adventurers.
target:
なんという見事な動きだ！
シャドウクローの眷属どもの動きを、完全に見切るとは！

source: <var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>)) /var> will appear once her subjects are slain.
target: ボム以外の魔物を排除すれば<var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>が姿を現す

source: Watch for <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>'s order to self-destruct.
target:
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>の自爆命令に注意し
爆発に巻き込まれぬよう注意せよ

source: The servitors will self-destruct once approached. Either strike them from afar, or avoid them altogether.
target:
赤いボムは、接近すると自爆する！
引き付けて倒すか、戦闘を避けるんだ！

source: All rise for Her Royal Highness! When angered, the queen will order her remaining subjects to self-destruct. Do not get caught in the blast.
target:
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>のお出ましだよ！
奴が配下に下す、自爆命令に注意しな！

source: The servitors will not hesitate to self-destruct. Steel your defenses!
target: 自爆に警戒しながら戦うんだよ！

source: Bomb chars are just as quick to burst as the servitors. Fall back!
target:
緑色のボムも接近すれば自爆する！
爆発には注意するんだよ！

source: There! To the rear! The bomb chars advance!
target:
緑色のボムは巡回するようだ！
不用意に近づかず、鉢合わせを回避しな！

source: There is no end to the bomb chars. Turn your eyes elsewhere.
target:
緑色のボムは、いくらでも湧いてくるようだね！
倒したところで切りが無いよ！

source: He who slumbers is doomed to bear the blast's full force. Silence the slimes, lest you succumb to the flames.
target:
眠らされては、爆発を避けることすらできん！
レッド・マシュマロを始末するんだよ！

source: The queen's subjects number in the thousands. You cannot dispel them all!
target:
取り巻きのボムどもは、倒してもキリがないぞ！
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>を狙うんだ！

source: The order has been given! Scatter!
target: 自爆命令を確認ッ！　各員退避せよッ！！

source: That was but one baronet amongst many. He may have fallen, but another will soon rise to replace him.
target:
ボムバロネットを倒したようだが気を抜くな！
ふたたび現れるのも時間の問題だ！

source: Good! The life spills from <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> with every blow!
target:
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>の体力もあと僅か！
各員、全力で攻撃を続行せよ！

source: When the queen falls, her subjects will be overtaken with grief and end their lives. Take care not to join them!
target:
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>を失えば、
残りのボムは一斉に自爆するぞ！　大爆発に備えよ！

source: Do not grow overconfident. While one candle gutters, still a hundred bonfires rage.
target:
いいぞ！　その調子で進軍し、
あのヌメヌメした奴らも根絶やしにしな！

source: How little the queen's baronets value their own lives. In a sense, they are the perfect subjects.
target:
次々とボムが湧いている！
自爆からの回避を怠るんじゃないよ！

source: The queen will not step down from her throne so easily.
target:
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>がこのまま終わるとは思えない。
気を抜くんじゃないよ！

source: Sound the bells! The queen is dead!
target: よし、ボムクイーンを仕留めたぞ！

source: All five <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 04E8020302 /var> must be defeated simultaneously.
target:
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>は
5体同時に撃破しないと復活する

source: Listen carefully if you want to live. <var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 02E8020202 /var>)) /var> will not stay dead for long. Allow his dark brothers but a moment, and they'll drag the fallen back from the gates of the seventh hell.
target:
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>は5体同時に倒せ！
さもなくば、奴らは復活してしまうぞ！

source: Another formation change!
target: また陣形を……何をするつもりだ！？

source: Make ready! The camios seek to regroup!
target: <var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>の陣形に注意しろ！

source: They're forming a defensive line!
target: 奴らが陣形を組み替えた！

source: A circle! The Screaming Circle!
target:
この陣形は！？
何が起こるか解らんぞ、警戒せよ！

source: The Wall of Naught! The camios seek a new victim!
target:
奴らが攻撃目標を切り替えた！
盾役は全力で、敵視を奪い味方を守り抜け！

source: The Black Cross renders a single camio invincible. Ignore him and focus your attacks on the rest!
target: 1体のカミオが無敵化する陣形だ！

source: The Demon's Sword! The burden on your front line will be great. Healers, do not fail your allies!
target: 先頭のカミオの攻撃力が増しているぞ！

source: Something rises from the Pit! Do not falter!
target:
円陣を組んで……ま、まさか！
奴らは別の妖異を召喚するつもりだぞッ！

source: Their foul magicks protect him! Your attacks amount to naught!
target:
1体のカミオが無敵化したぞ！
陣形の効果なのか？

source: As long as one cannot be harmed, you will never be able to destroy the lot!
target:
1体が無敵化している！
これでは5体同時討伐は不可能だ！

source: One is down. Quickly! Finish the others!
target:
5体同時に倒さねばならん！
復活する前に、残りの連中を叩け！

source: You see? Slaying one is of no use! You must defeat all five at once if the day is to be yours!
target:
クソッ……やはり、復活してしまったか！
いいか、<var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>は5体同時に倒せ！

source: The camio draws strength from the Demon's Sword. He will tear your front line apart!
target:
力が増している<var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>に警戒せよ！
いいか、盾役がしっかり味方を守るんだ！

source: Follow the camio's eyes! Draw them away from your spell casters!
target: 連中の敵視の変化を見逃すな！

source: Do not waste your efforts on the one who cannot be harmed!
target: 防御陣形に注意！　攻撃目標を選べよ！

source: Shields up, front line!
target: 攻撃陣形に注意！　盾役の出番だッ！

source: Rid the playing field of our new guest!
target:
奴の攻撃は油断ならん！
先に始末し、安全を確保するんだ！

source: Back to the task at hand, lads!
target:
よくやったぞ！
あとは残りの奴らを倒すだけだ！

source: Show them only as much mercy as they would show you! None!
target: その調子で、押し切れッ！

source: You've done it! They can no longer escape their dark demesne!
target: よし、「カミオ」の完全消滅を確認した！

source: Protect the Allagan artifacts from the quarreling gigants.
target: <var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>を守りつつ、巨人族をせん滅

source: Defeat the leaders to prevent the summoning of reinforcements.
target:
各巨人族を率いるリーダーを倒せば
増援を阻止できる

source: Hurry to the foot of the hill! The artifacts will not protect themselves!
target:
まずは遺物の元へと急げ！
巨人族から守るには、それしかない！

source: They're fighting amongst themselves! Let them bloody each other's noses before coming in to wipe up the mess!
target:
ギガース族の出現を確認！
いいか、奴らの攻撃が遺物に及ばんようにな！

source: Small units approach! Keep them off the artifacts!
target:
小規模の敵増援を確認！
数は少ないが、油断するんじゃないぞ！

source: Gigants from multiple sides! You'll need to divide your strength if the artifacts are to be saved!
target:
大規模な敵増援を確認！
二手に分かれて、対処せよ！

source: The gigas leader, Crius! He will summon his minions if not put to the sword!
target:
ギガース族の頭目が現れたぞ！
奴を倒して、これ以上の増援を食い止めろ！

source: Giants to the east! Stop them before they can make the approach!
target:
ジャイアント族の増援を確認！
遺物に近づく前に排除せよ！

source: Hecatoncheires to the south! Slaying them might just anger their leader onto the battlefield!
target:
ヘカトンケイレス族の増援を確認！
奴らを倒せば、頭目も黙ってはおらんぞ！

source: Thal's balls! Both giant <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> hecatoncheir leaders make for the artifacts!
target:
ジャイアント族とヘカトンケイレス族の頭目が現れた！
奴らが鉢合わせないよう、優先して叩け！

source: Damnation! Keep the leaders away from one another! It will only serve to worsen matters!
target:
クソッ……頭目が増援を呼んだぞ！
いいか、頭目同士の接触を防ぐんだ！

source: The gigants swing their weapons with reckless abandon! Draw them from the artifacts so as to prevent any collateral damage!
target:
広範囲を攻撃する敵の技に注意しろ！
遺物が巻き込まれんようにな！

source: The gigas leader flees! Now is your chance! Run the bastard through!
target:
ギガース族の頭目が逃走しはじめたぞ！
今が好機だ、逃すな！　追撃せよ！

source: The giant leader falls back... Something is amiss!
target:
ジャイアント族の頭目が後退を始めただと？
罠かもしれん、注意しろよ！

source: That is not the back of a fleeing man! The hecatoncheir leads you into a trap!
target:
あれは負けを認めた背中じゃない！
罠に警戒しつつ追撃せよ！

source: More gigants take the field, and will continue to do so until you have seen their leaders slain!
target:
新たな増援の出現を確認！
いいか、頭目を倒し、増援を呼ばせるな！

source: Not a single scratch on any of the artifacts. I wouldn't believe it if I hadn't seen it with mine own eyes!
target:
遺物に傷一つ付けないとは……
まさに完勝だ！　オレは誇りに思うぞ！

source: All the artifacts remain! The Sons of Saint Coinach will be pleased!
target:
遺物を守り切ったようだな。
我々の勝利だ！

source: Two artifacts remain standing. See that they are not destroyed!
target:
残る遺物はふたつだ！
巨人族を近づけるんじゃない！

source: A single artifact remains! You cannot allow it to be lost!
target:
残る遺物は、あとひとつ！
ええい、しっかり守り抜くんだ！

source: The leaders have yet to take the field, but could arrive at any moment. Stay alert!
target: じきに敵将が来るぞ。遺物を守り抜くんだ！

source: Without an enemy to strike, the gigants have turned their fury on the artifacts!
target:
巨人どもが遺物に手を出しているぞ！
しっかり守るんだ！

source: <var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 04E8020202 /var>)) /var>
target: <var 28 ((BNpcName)) E80201 /var>

source: Slay all the enemies
target: 魔物をせん滅

source: Clear the Feeding Pit
target: 飽食の前室を突破

source: Clear the Sunken Antechamber
target: 沈殿せし中室を突破

source: Clear the Oratory of Tatamefu II
target: タタメフII世の祈祷所を突破

source: Clear the Rosarium of Lalafuto I
target: ララフトI世の中庭に侵入

source: Clear the Adytum of Lalafuto IV
target: ララフトIV世の地下神殿を突破

source: Tip the Scales of Judgment
target: 審理の天秤を動かす

source: Place which object?
target: 「審理の天秤」に何を設置する？

source: <var 2B ((<var 28 ((EventItem)) E80201 /var>)) /var>.
target: <var 28 ((EventItem)) E80201 /var>

source: Cancel.
target: キャンセル

source: It sits motionless.
target: もう動かないようだ……

source: A statuette has already been placed.
target: すでに彫像が置かれている……

source: I will suffer none to oppose Lord van Baelsar!
target:
来い！　閣下の理想に仇なす者よ！
貴様の野望は、ここで果てる！

source: My shields are impregnable! Join the countless challengers who have dashed themselves against them!
target:
反逆者は、我が盾……
ガンシールド「タルタロス」の前に必滅……！

source: Your defeat will bring Lord van Baelsar's noble conquest one step closer to fruition!
target:
逃がさん……！
閣下によるエオルゼア統一の、礎となるがいい！

source: Ungh... Though it cost me my life...I <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> strike you down!
target: グッ……この血が枯れても、貴様を討つ……！

source: Heehee HAHA hahaha HEEHEE haha HEEEEEE!!!
target:
はじめようぞ、虫ケラ……
わたくしの風でッ！　嵐でッ！　無残に散れッ！

source: Soon you will see the depths of your folly, mortals!
target:
わたくしは空の覇者なるぞッ！
この翼から逃れるすべなどないと知れッ！

source: THE RECKONING COMES!!!
target: その首ッ！　その四肢ッ！　引き裂いてくれるッ！

source: There is no escape! No hope! NONE!!!
target:
ギィィッ！　憎たらしいクソ虫めッ！
望みどおり、なぶってくれるわッ！

source: Die! DIE!!! DIIIIIIEEE!!!
target:
もはや殺すのでは足りぬッ！
千々に刻めッ……！　我が蜃気楼たちッ！

source: My power... No...
target: お、おのれ……クソ虫がぁぁぁぁぁッ！！！

source: Sons of man! Murderers of my children!
target:
横暴なるヒトの子よ……
お主を屠り、我が子らの嘆きを止めようぞ！

source: For thee my hatred is unending, unyielding!
target:
滾る！　滾るぞ！
憤怒の血が、我が心臓に注ぎ込む！

source: Tremble before the might of the earth!
target: 「大地の怒り」に砕け散れぇぇぇぇぇ！

source: To the last, I grapple with thee!
target:
耐えぬく気概や良し！
その意思、我が拳で粉砕せん！

source: I shall grind thee beneath my heel, mortal!
target:
轟け、大地の躍動よ！
地の底に沈むがいい！

source: Hie, my children, into the dark! <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> will not be denied...
target:
ぬぬぬぬ……無念……
愛しき子らの悲嘆、いずれ必ず……。

source: I'm here... I'm here... I'm here...
target:
ウ……オオォ……
オイテカ、ナイ、デ……。

source: Mother... Father... I can't... I can't find you...
target:
イタイ……クルシイ……
心臓ガ、熱イ……ッ！

source: WAAAKE UUUUUUP!!!
target: ウアアアアアアアアアアッ！！

source: Why... Why... Why... WHYYYYYY!!!
target:
ウッ……ウウッ……
ボクハ……ドウシテ…………。

source:
I said I'd come! I said I'd come!
I'm here... I'm here... I'm here...
target:
ヤダ、ヤダ……！
コワイヨ……タスケテ……！

source: Where are you... Where are you...
target: アァ……オトウサン……オカアサン…………。

source: Darken the searchlight
target: 警戒灯を停止させろ

source: Darken the searchlight
target: 警戒灯を停止させろ

source: Obtain incendiary #37
target: XXXVII式爆薬

source: Destroy the ceruleum pump
target: 汲上ポンプを破壊せよ

source: Destroy the field generator
target: フィールド発生装置を破壊せよ

source: Imperial Identification Key
target: 帝国軍認証鍵

source: Darken the searchlight
target: 警戒灯を停止させろ

source: Darken the searchlight
target: 警戒灯を停止させろ

source: Stand back! I'm going to blast open the bulkhead!
target: どいてな、そこの隔壁にぶっぱなす！

source: This might take a while! Watch my back!
target: こいつを壊すまで、雑魚の掃除は任せたぞ！

source: I'm almost there! Keep that thing occupied!
target:
チッ、あと少しだってのに……！
あいつの相手を頼む！

source: Come, <var 1A 02 /var>hero<var 1A 01 /var>, show me what you can do. Show me...<var 1A 02 /var>everything<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: さあ……あなたの力、見せてちょうだい！

source: I see...
target: なるほど、こんなものか……。

source: You will <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> take any more from me!
target: アタシから奪った分……貴様の全てを奪ってやる！

source: The pain I have suffered, I shall visit upon you a hundredfold!
target:
ガンバグナウ「アグライア」、
この痛み、たっぷりと味わせてやるッ！

source: You lot! Make yourselves useful!
target:
お前たち！　死ぬ気でアイツを殺しなさい！
できなければ殺すわよ……！

source: You have made me <var 1A 02 /var>wroth<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
調子に乗るなぁぁぁぁ！
貴様が英雄なら、せいぜい生き延びてみろッ！

source: Noooooo! I will not lose...to the likes of <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: なぜ……なぜ、貴様なんかに……ッ！

source: Damn it, that colossus is enhanced! Hold on─I'll try to think of something!
target:
魔導コロッサスを強化してやがるのか……！
解除は俺に任せておけ！

source: Imperial Identification Key
target: 帝国軍認証鍵

source: Secure the command chamber
target: 軍団長室を占拠せよ

source: Make for the Laboratorium Primum
target: 地下研究所へ向かえ

source: Board the magitek armor
target: 魔導アーマーに搭乗

source: Defeat Nero tol Scaeva
target: ネロ・トル・スカエウァを倒せ

source: Defeat Gaius van Baelsar
target: ガイウス・ヴァン・バエサルを倒せ

source: Defeat the Ultima Weapon
target: アルテマウェポンを倒せ

source: Defeat Lahabrea
target: アシエン・ラハブレアを倒せ

source: You'll need proper firepower to blast through that. Try and find another path to the armor bay.
target:
そいつを開けるには、魔導アーマーが必要だな……。
別の道を進んで「魔導アーマー駐機庫」を目指すんだ。

source: There ought to be an identification key reader nearby. You need to complete pilot registration before you can activate an armor.
target:
その辺りに、魔導アーマーの「認証装置」があるはずだ。
そいつで搭乗員登録をしたら、魔導アーマーを起動するんだ。

source: Well, well, would you look at this! I've found just the unit for you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
……おっと、こいつは……。
ハハッ、面白い機体を見つけたぜ。

source: I'll send the identification data to the terminal. You can use that to activate her.
target:
ターミナルに機体番号を送っておく。
こいつを起動してみてくれ。

source: I have taken the liberty of preparing an <var 1A 02 /var>electrifying<var 1A 01 /var> stage for you.
target:
お前のために、とっておきの舞台を用意したンだ。
痺れちまわないように、注意だぜ？

source: Meet one of my creations. You might find it a <var 1A 02 /var>handful<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
オレが開発した魔導兵器「デスクロー」だ！
こいつはちょっと手ごわいぜ？

source: I will lay Garlond low, but first I must break you!
target:
ガンハンマー「ミョルニル」！
オレのオモチャで叩きつぶしてやるよ！

source: <pant> I will not suffer...to be in another's shadow!
target:
ハッ……お前にまで負けるってのか……？
……クソが、なめンじゃねぇよ。

source: Let us dance, champion of Eorzea.
target:
英雄……それもまた偽りの偶像。
我が討ち破ってくれる！

source: Impressive! Now it is <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> turn!
target:
やるではないか！
ならば……これはどうだ！？

source: Yaaaaaarrrgh!
target: うおおおおおお！！

source: The Ultima Weapon has partaken of the power of eikons! None can stand against it!
target:
蛮神どもを食らい、究極へと至った力……
貴様では及びもしまい！

source: Hearken unto me, crystal bearer. Thy foe is Darkness clad in steel.
target:
……光のクリスタルを手にし者よ。
それは、闇が作りし機械仕掛けの神……。

source: If thou wouldst triumph, thou must look to the Light.
target:
光のクリスタルに願うのです……
闇の力を打ち砕く……光の力を！

source: Yield to the storm!
target: ガルーダの「エリアルブラスト」で消し飛ぶがいい！

source: Garuda's essence...torn from the Ultima Weapon!?
target:
バカなッ！？
外部から蛮神「ガルーダ」を引き剥がしたというのか！

source: Kneel to the might below!
target: タイタンの「大地の怒り」で平伏すがいい！

source: Titan's as well!? Impossible!
target:
ええいッ！
蛮神「タイタン」まで！

source: Succumb to the flames!
target: イフリートの「地獄の火炎」で灰と化すがいい！

source: Nooo! How...how are you doing this!?
target:
蛮神「イフリート」までも引き剥がしただと！？
……何なのだ、この力は！？

source: We settle this once and for all!
target:
いくぞ、冒険者！
貴様と我……これで最後の戦いだ！

source: I need not the power of eikons to defeat you!
target: 蛮神の力などなくとも、覇道は我にあり！

source: This is most...unexpected. You are possessed of great might, this I will allow.
target:
まさか、ここまで押されることになろうとは……。
認めよう貴様の力……「持つ者」は貴様だ。

source: Yet yours is not the might of a ruler! Such is the difference between us─a difference that will assure my victory!
target:
しかし、「統べる者」は違う。
力には力で示そう、我こそがその者だと！

source: U-Ultima!? Curse you, Ascian!
target:
なに！？
アルテマ……だと！？

source: How much destruction must be wreaked before you are sated!?
target:
ええい、アシエン・ラハブレアめ……。
またもあれを撃つ気か！？

source: I have not the strength...to shield thee again...
target: 滅びの魔法が……再び放たれようとしています……。

source: Permit not the manifestation of that vile magick...lest Darkness prevail!
target:
光の戦士よ、滅びを阻止するのです……。
あれは絶望の闇……許してはなりません……。

source: Your time is at an end, Hydaelyn!
target:
フハハハハハ！
ハイデリンごと、消えてなくなれぃ！！

source: From the deepest pit of the seven hells to the very pinnacle of the heavens, the world shall tremble! Unleash Ultima!
target:
渦なす生命の色、七つの扉開き、力の塔の天に至らん！
……アルテマッ！

source: Ahahahaha! You are strong, Warrior of Light!
target:
フハハハハハハ！
やるではないか、光の使徒よ！

source: Yet know that if I should perish, so too will the mortal within whose flesh I reside.
target:
しかし、よいのか……このまま私を倒すということは、
私が取り憑いた、この者を殺すということだぞ？

source: Now make your choice and live with it! Muahahahahaha!
target:
フハハハハハハ！
さぁ、どうする、光の使徒よ！

source: Mark not the Dark Minion's subtle words.
target:
光の意志を持つ者よ……。
闇の言葉に惑わされてはなりません……。

source: Only Light may banish the Darkness.
target: 闇の力を打ち砕くのは、光の力のみ。

source: Receive of me this power, my child, and raise thy Crystal aloft!
target:
今一度……あなたに……光の力を……。
さぁ、光のクリスタルを掲げるのです！

source: Ultima detonation in 20 seconds.
target: アルテマ発動まで　20　秒！

source: Ultima detonation in 10 seconds.
target: アルテマ発動まで　10　秒！

source: Ultima detonation in 5...
target: アルテマ発動まで　5　秒！
アルテマ発動まで　4　秒！
アルテマ発動まで　3　秒！
アルテマ発動まで　2　秒！
アルテマ発動まで　1　秒！

source: Gain access to the exploratory site
target: 「メテオの探査坑」への進路確保

source: Breach the aetherial fields
target: エーテリアルフィールドの開放

source: Breach the aetherial fields
target: エーテリアルフィールドの開放

source: Power the Allagan terminal
target: アラガンターミナルの作動

source: Slay all the enemies
target: 敵のせん滅

source: Secure the barbican
target: バービガンの制圧

source: Retake the right brattice
target: 右翼ブレテーシュの奪還

source: Defeat Isgebind
target: イスケビンドの撃破

source: Clear the Gier Hall
target: 不浄の大広間の突破

source: Clear the Bloody Transept
target: 惨劇の翼廊の突破

source: Defeat Anantaboga
target: アナンタボガの撃破

source: Clear the aether pump
target: エーテルポンプ室の突破

source: Clear the second spire
target: 第二塔基部の突破

source: Clear the fuel chamber
target: エーテル貯蔵室の突破

source: Clear the aether compressor
target: エーテル圧縮室の突破

source: Defeat the siren
target: セイレーンの撃破

source: Souls adrift...my embrace...come hither...♪
target:
♪あら、また貴方なの？
　愛の輪廻に囚われし、哀れな罪人さん…

source: Songs...the sea...forever...with me...♪
target:
♪愛は静かな海のように　寄せては返す波のように
　愛は求め　私を求め　愛の亡者と化してゆく…

source: Broken...a cry...dreams of glory...come to die...♪
target:
♪愛の亡者は踊り続ける　私を求め踊り続ける
　愛は求め　私を求め　傀儡となりて舞い踊る…

source: Ocean...shame...fated ones...in flames...♪
target:
♪愛の亡者は踊り続ける　歌に応え踊り続ける
　愛は求め　私を求め　寵愛得んと這い回る…

source: My song...silenced...in darkness...quiet...
target:
……私の歌声が届かぬとは……
　口惜しや、口惜しや……

source: Urggghhh! I'll gut any of ye what lays a hand on me muse!
target:
我ガ愛ト忠誠……
セイレーン様ニ捧グ！！

source: Scurvy dogs... Ye know not love! Aggghhh...
target:
来イ！　犬ドモ！
我ガ愛ヲ阻ム者ヲ、咬ミ殺セ！！

source: L-Land!? Land ho! Diamanda, I've come...urgh...home...
target:
……ここは……俺は……一体……
ディアマンダ……必ず帰る…から……

source: Activate the Allagan teleporters
target: アラグの転移装置の起動

source: Clear the Pools of Oblivion
target: 亡者の浴室の踏破

source: Defeat the bone dragon
target: ボーンドラゴンの撃破

source: Clear the Walk of Lament
target: 嘆声の歩廊の踏破

source: Defeat Thanatos
target: タナトスの撃破

source: Clear the Walk of Fire
target: 焦熱の歩廊の踏破

source: Defeat the king behemoth
target: キングベヒーモスの撃破

source: Defeat Phlegethon
target: ティターンの撃破

source: Grrraaaaaarrrghhh!
target: グガァァァッ！

source: Clear the Screaming Dark
target: 喚きの立坑の踏破

source: Clear the Crying Dark
target: 嘆きの立坑の踏破

source: Defeat Ouranos
target: 復讐のウラノスの撃破

source:
BURN, BURN!
ALL IS BURN!
target:
モエロ、モエロ！
オデのホノオでモエぢまえ～！

source:
BURN, BURN!
HM? WHERE IS BURN?
target:
ウガァ……
オデのホノオが…キエぢまう……

source:
Biggy is big! Biggy is strong!
No one stands up to Biggy!
target:
ウォォ、オレサマ、ビィギー！
ビッグデ、ムキムキ、スプリガァァァン！

source:
Biggy's muscles bulge!
Ow-ow-ow...
target: ムキムキ、ハガレテ、コンチクショー！

source: Biggy has only begun to fight!
target: マダマダ、タタカウ、コンニャロー！

source: Biggy is small, but Biggy's heart is big!
target:
ムキムキ、ナクテモ、ココロハ、ビッグ！
オマエラ、ゼンイン、ミチヅレダー！

source:
Aieeeeee!
Biggy's too young to die!
target: ビィギー、モウダメ、コウサンダ……

source:
YOU KILL MY SON?
I KILL YOU!
target:
オデのムスゴ、コロしたのオメかァ！？
フクシュウ、フクシュウ、フクシュウだァ！！！

source:
MY SONS...
I...FAIL...YOU...
target: ムスゴたちよ……スマヌ……

source:
CUTE WRIGGLY-WIGGLIES!
CRUSH PUNY ONES!
target:
オデのカワイイ、イモムシちゅわん！
ジャマなチビども、ツブしちまえェ！！！

source: Hearken unto me, brave Mogglesguard! These villains shall threaten you no more!
target: 家臣たちよ、ワルモノを裁くクポーッ！

source: Lend me your strength, and I shall purge our enemies from Thornmarch!
target: 家臣たちの忠義を、力に変えるクポーッ！

source: You shall suffer for your transgressions against my subjects!
target: メメント・モーグリ！　モグを記憶せよクポーッ！

source: Hold fast, Mogglesguard! Together we shall cast them out!
target: 家臣たちよ、連携して戦うべしクポーッ！

source: Mogglesguard, to arms! Your king has need of you!
target: 家臣団よ、出陣せよクポーッ！

source: Receive of my body, Mogglesguard! Let my strength become yours!
target: さあ！　回復してやろうクポ！

source: Begone, pomless ones! Torment my subjects no more!
target: もうひといきクポ！　パワーをメテオに！

source: Clear the White Hall
target: 白百合の間の突破

source: Clear the Red Hall
target: 紅薔薇の間の突破

source: Defeat Halicarnassus
target: ハリカルナッソスの撃破

source: Slake my hunger and know true glory!
target: 我が血肉となる光栄に浴せ！

source: I shall feast upon your very soul!
target: 魂捧げ、我が糧となれ！

source:
I still hunger...
Bring me more...more!
target: 贄を、もっと贄を……

source: Your souls are mine at last!
target:
魂を捧げるとの誓い……
今こそ果たしてもらうぞ！

source: Tiny Keys
target: 小さな鍵所持数

source: This way lies the first stage! By way of a warm-up, your opponents will be beasts and mammets!
target:
さあ、第一の修練区画だ！
魔法人形を相手に、小手調べといこうか！

source: The second stage begins! Gird your loins for a <var 1A 02 /var>beastly<var 1A 01 /var> encounter!
target:
第二の修練区画へ進むがいい！
猛獣、魔獣が相手になるぞ！

source: You have done well to come this far, but the hardest trials are yet to come. In the third stage, you must clash steel with seasoned gladiators!
target:
最後の修練区画まで、よく来たな！
いよいよ、本物の剣闘士たちのお出ましだぞ！

source: Defeat the mammets
target: マメットを討伐

source: Defeat Pyracmon
target: ピュラクモンの撃破

source: Defeat the caged beasts
target: 魔獣を討伐

source: Defeat the catoblepas
target: カトブレパスの撃破

source: Defeat the gladiators
target: 剣闘士を討伐

source: Complete the final test
target: すべての敵の撃破

source: And so we arrive at the climactic ending! Victory belongs to the beauteous!
target: さて、最後は集団戦の訓練と洒落込もうじゃないか！

source: You may be able to stand with the best of the bloodsands, but how will you fare against the mightiest thaumaturge of the age?
target:
ほほ～う、一流の剣闘士たちを退けるとは～。
大導師ムムエポと、我がシモベがお相手しましょう～！

source: There is no escaping the Absolute Bind!
target:
アルダネス聖櫃堂に伝わる古代魔法！
この呪縛には～手も足もでないでしょう～？

source: Wh-What? But...how!?
target:
……なんとっ！？
完全呪縛に、抗ったというのですか～？

source: Run, my pretties, lest you feel the searing kiss of my magicks!
target:
さあ～逃げまどいなさ～い！
我が魔力を束ねし～呪いの雷から～！

source: You trespass upon my domain, tainted of the Light!
target: 我が海域を侵すか、光に穢れし者よ！

source: Drink deep of the sea's bitter draught!
target: 清浄なる青き水を以て、穢れ清めん！

source: Mine is the power to cleanse all things! Naught can withstand the relentless onslaught of my waves!
target:
我が水の力……
全てを押し流し、全てを浄化する力！

source: You challenge me with trickery? Fools! Your mortal contrivances cannot quell the raging sea!
target:
ぬぅ、小細工を弄したか……
なれば真なる力を解き放つのみ！

source: My waters...are stilled... This...this is the blessing of Light?
target:
これが光の加護……
我が力を水泡に帰すとは……

target: 属性変換エーテル

source: Your flesh shall feed my minions of the deep!
target: 我が水の力にて、押し流してくれようぞ！

source: Knowings of cheesemake is gobbie secret!
target:
チーズレシピは　門外不出！
我は　秘密の守護者なり～！！

source: All cheese recipes are belong to Illuminati!
target:
シュコォ、シュコォ……
邪魔する者は　抹殺だ～！！

source: Shkoh! Target is eyecatched! All hands, forcetake Brayflox!
target:
シュコォ、シュコォ……
目標発見　作戦開始　ブレイフロクス捕まえろ～！

source: Illuminati brainfruit is frontmost! Uplanders have no chance to survive!
target:
青の手　科学は　世界イチ～！
ゴブリガードで　蹴散らすど～！！

source: Who dares set foot within my domain? The wretched white mages of Amdapor?
target:
我の眠りをさまたげる者は、誰だ？
アムダプールの魔道士ども……いや、違うな？

source: To face me is to face thy deepest, darkest nightmares!
target:
夜の闇束ね、我が盾と成さん……
我を阻むこと叶わぬと知れ！

source: Not even in eternal sleep shalt thou be free from the terror of my weaving!
target:
暗き闇紡ぎて、死を知らせる弔鐘と成せ！
ルイナスオーメン！

source: My long slumber...hath weakened me...
target: 長き眠りで、我が力も衰えたか……

source:
来たな冒険者、お前に勝って武器をいただくぜ！
ゆくぞ、エンキドゥ！　我が心の友よ！
target:
来たな冒険者、お前に勝って武器をいただくぜ！
ゆくぞ、エンキドゥ！　我が心の友よ！

source: Fine! I admit it!
target: オレが悪かった……。

source: Fighting all eight of you...
target: 8人でこられちゃ……。

source: Is just too much for me...
target: 手も足もでないぜ……。

source: NOT! Ha, I lied!
target: ……てのは、ウソだけどな！！

source: Have at thee!
target:
こいつを食らえっ！
うおおおっ！　メガフレアっ！！

source: Ehhh!? Why, I've been had! This is far from the strongest of spears! I feel so betrayed!
target:
……ありゃ？　メガフレアが出ない？
最強の槍じゃないのかー！

source: Goodness gracious! I, uh, just remembered something!
target:
急用を思いだしたぜ！！
必ず戻って来るからなっ！

source: Go on, Enkidu! It's toad─your favorite!
target:
行け、エンキドゥ！
大好物の蛙だぞ！

source: I must say, I quite enjoy these tussles. I feel we've gained an understanding─
target:
も、もういいだろ！
お前らしつこすぎだぞ！

source: An understanding that I will pound you silly! Ha ha!
target:
……上等だぜ。
このギルガメッシュ様を倒せるかな？

source: Urgh! I won't go down so easily!
target: しぶといヤツらだぜ……。

source:
これなるはエオルゼアいちの強者……
その名も、剣豪ギルガメッシュ！
target:
これなるはエオルゼアいちの強者……
その名も、剣豪ギルガメッシュ！

target: 主格納庫の鍵を入手

source: Slay the giruveganauses
target: ギルヴェガノスの撃破

source:
Man the cannon whilst
we bleed the beast!
target:
ヤツは我らが抑える！
対竜カノン砲で援護してくれ！

source:
Heavy fortifications!
Fire with care!
target:
クソッ！　防御を固めたか！
うかつに砲撃するんじゃないぞ！

source:
...D-Down to the last man?
We have failed...
target:
……ぜ、全滅だと！？
奪還作戦は……失敗だ……

source:
Thou art brave, Bringer of Light.
Yet bravery alone shall not convince me of thy worth!
target:
来たか、光の者よ……
貴様の力、測らせてもらおうぞ！

source: Prove thy words are more than empty banter!
target: これより裁きを下す……心せよ！

source:
This battle shall decide thy fate.
Canst thou weather mine awakened ire!?
target:
ファファファ、久方ぶりの戦い……
我が技もさえてきよったわ！

source:
Thy judgment is nigh...
To me, mine arbiters!
target:
審判の時は近い……
集え、裁断者たちよ！

source:
Art thou truly of man?
Thy strength exceeds mine expectations...
target:
お主、一体……？
これがヒトの可能性なのか……。

source:
I pronounce thy sentence!
By the radiance of eld be thee judged!
target:
輝ける古の知に照らし、
我、汝に厳正なる審判を降さん！

source: Clear the Ladder of Ascension
target: 至天の階段の踏破

source: Defeat Scylla
target: 妖艶のスキュラの撃破

source: Clear the Braid
target: 螺旋回廊の踏破

source: Defeat Glasya Labolas
target: 不壊のガーディアンの撃破

source: Clear the Golden Sacristy
target: 黄金回廊の踏破

source: Defeat Amon
target: 異才のアモンの撃破

source: Defeat Xande
target: 始皇帝ザンデの撃破

source: Glasya Labolas Charge
target: ガーディアン：エネルギー充填率

source: My hounds hunger for man-flesh!
target:
グルルルルル……犬が……
犬どもが求めておるぞ、貴様らの肉を！

source: You think me an aberration, do you!? Denials are futile─I can <var 1A 02 /var>smell<var 1A 01 /var> your vile thoughts!
target:
おぞましい……妾の姿を、そう思ったな？
許さぬ、許さぬ、許さぬぞォォォ！

source: You shall pay dearly for making mock of my appearance!
target:
おのれ、おのれ、おのれェェェ！
貴様らも、妾をあざ笑うのかァァァ！

source: Scorch their insolent hides, my hounds!
target:
吠えろ犬ども！
無礼な輩を燃やしつくせェェェ！

source: The hounds...grow silent... Finally...I may rest...
target:
あぁ……犬どもの声が……消えてゆく……
これで、ようやく……眠れ……。

source: You who would bare steel against the emperor. You shall not pass so long as I draw breath!
target:
我は帝国の守護者。
これより先、一歩たりとも進ませんぞ！

source:
Activating support protocol...
Charging energy stores!
target:
支援機構始動……
エネルギー充填開始！

source: Ignorant savages! You will rue the day you set foot within this tower!
target:
陛下に仇なす愚民ども！
その愚かさを身を以て思い知れ！

source:
Energy stores replenished...
In the name of Emperor Xande, I shall annihilate you!
target:
充填率100％……
消えよ、陛下に仇なす愚民ども！

source:
Activating defense protocol...
Be it steel or sorcery, your weapons shall not avail you!
target:
防御装置起動！
不壊たるゆえんを見せてくれる！

source: That my defenses...could be breached...
target:
み、見事なり……
我が守りを、打ち崩すとは……。

source: My, my, such unruly guests. 'Twould seem a little diversion is in order.
target:
おやおや、随分と無粋な客ですネ……
せめて、華々しくお散りなサイ！

source: That will do for the opening act. Let the curtains rise for the main attraction!
target:
もう余興は十分でショウ……
そろそろ、幕引きとさせていただきますヨ！

source:
Inconceivable...
Beware, Your Majesty... Danger approaches...
target:
ま、まさか、このワタシが……
陛下……こ奴らは、危険……ですゾ……。

source: Not in use
target: ザンデ／戦闘開始時※未使用

source: Mine is the power of darkness! Even the stars must bend to my will!
target:
力を……闇の力を感じるぞ……
さあ、星すら統べる我が魔力を見よ！

source: I shall crush all who dare oppose me!
target:
ファファファ……我が覇道を阻まんとする者よ。
暗き星に、押しつぶされるがいい！

source: My defeat...means nothing... Darkness...shall devour all...
target:
グフッ……私を倒しても……無駄だ……
全ては、闇に……包まれるのだ……。

source: Clear the interring chamber
target: 壺室の踏破

source: Clear the Tomb of King Galvanth the Dominator
target: 絶対王ガルヴァンスの墓の踏破

source: Clear Eternal Calm
target: 幽寂の円環の踏破

source: Urgh... I <var 1A 02 /var>told<var 1A 01 /var> them she was weird...but they wouldn't listen...
target:
だから、あたしは……嫌いだったのよ……
キモチ悪い……やつ……。

source: I...I can't move my body! Help me!
target:
み、身動きがとれない！
誰か……誰か、助けてくれぇ！

source: <huff> <puff> I thought I was done for... I owe you one...
target:
はぁ、はぁ、はぁ……。
た、助かった……恩に着るぜ……。

source: I...I can't stand being here any longer. I'll see you outside!
target:
な、なんで俺が、こんな目に……。
アイツに関わるのは、もう懲り懲りだ……。

source: Thank you ever so much for coming to our wedding! Your body means the world to Avere!
target:
ふふふ……わたしたちの結婚式にようこそ……
あなた、あの冒険者が来てくれたわよ？

source: Hm? Where are our witnesses? The ceremony can't begin without them!
target:
立会人さん、どこなの？
もう式は始まっているわ、来てちょうだい！

source: Your wait is over, my love! All you have ever dreamed of is right here!
target:
わかってる、わかってるわ……
新しい身体が欲しいよね？

source: To have and to hold, for better or for worse, for richer or for poorer...
target:
病める時も、健やかなる時も……
わたしたちは、ずっと一緒……永遠に……。

source: In sickness and in health, to love and to cherish...till death us do part!
target:
だから、させない……
邪魔はさせないわ！

source: Oh, Avere! I can feel the strength of your love inside me!
target:
感じるわ、愛を感じるわ！
アヴィールの愛をぉぉぉぉぉぉ！

source: Nooo... Please don't go... Don't leave me alone...
target:
あぁ、行かないで、アヴィール……
わたしを、ひとりぼっちにしないで……。

source: Aaaaaaaaah!
target: キシャァァァァァ！！！

target: 太陽石を入手する

target: カーラボスの撃破

target: マディソン元船長の撃破

target: ヘールスティム副長の撃破

source: Defeat the kraken
target: クラーケンの撃破

source: We got usselves some company, lads! In the name o' Lord Leviathan...kill 'em an' make 'em dead!
target:
船員どもめ、不甲斐ない奴らだ！
水神様から授かったこの力で、粉砕してくれる！

source: Look sharp, ye useless bloody whoresons!
target: おい、オメェら、シャキっとしねぇか！

source: Kill 'em, I said! What part o' that don't ye understand!?
target: オメェらも、はやく戦いやがれ！

source: Are we pirates or spineless swivin' jellyfish!? Fight harder!
target:
くそぉぉぉ、腑抜けちまいやがって、
海賊根性を見せてみろやぁぁぁ！

source: Ugh... I'm sorry, Cap'n...
target: せ、船長……すんませ……ゲフッ……

source: <var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var>! Yer that bastard 'venturer from afore! It's yer fault we're abominations!
target:
お、お前は、いつぞやの冒険者！？
こんな姿になったのは、お前のせいなんだぞ！

source: Ye want Lord Leviathan to punish us again!? Get yer poxy arses over here, all o' ye!
target:
はやく手を貸すんだ、野郎ども！
また水神様のお仕置きを受けたくないだろ！

source: W-We can't fail! Not again!
target: また負ける訳には、いかねぇんだよ！

source: Argh, that bloody hurt!
target:
イタ、イタタタタ……
これまた洒落にならんぞ！

source:
Ack, sod this...
You lot, take care o' the rest!
target:
やべぇ、本当にやべぇ……
野郎ども、後はまかせたぜ！？

source: I'll be waitin' fer ye with a surprise...assumin' ye live long enough, that is!
target:
またまた大事な用を、
思い出しちまったぜッ！

source: Die, ye swivin' whoresons! Yaaargh!
target: こ、こっちにくるんじゃねぇ！　離れやがれッ……！

source: H-How the hells did I miss!? That's <var 1A 02 /var>balls<var 1A 01 /var>, I tell ye!
target: イタタタ……クソッ、狙いが外れた！？　やってくれるぜ！

target: トンベリの救出

target: 排水管理室の踏破

target: 光鱗のモラージャジャの撃破

source: 空枠
target: 空枠

source:
Adventurers? Here?
Why lookout no catch you!?
target:
冒険者、の襲撃だ、と！？
ええい、見張り、は何をしてい、た！

source: You brave to defy Silverscales─brave or stupid!
target: 光鱗戦闘団、に楯突くと、はいい度胸、だ！

source: Burn!
target: 焼き尽くし、てくれよう、ぞ！

source: Honor to you who slay Koheel Ja!
target: コヘージャ、を倒した腕前、に敬意を表そう、ぞ……。

source: Much honor in death by old magicks of Mamool Ja!
target: マムージャ伝統の妖術、をとくと味わうがい、い！

source: H-Honor to you who slay...me...
target: グフッ……その腕前、見事な、り……。

source:
We smash them, Brother?
<var 1A 02 /var>Into pulp, yesss, into pulp<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
我々の力、見せてやるぞ、我が弟、よ！
もちろんだ、兄上、俺たちこそが最強、だ！

source:
I no hold back, Brother!
<var 1A 02 /var>Yesss, kill them─kill them now<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
我が弟、よ、本気を出す、ぞ！
承知した、兄上、よ！

source:
Brother, I d-d-die?
<var 1A 02 /var>Me too, Brothe...<var 1A 01 /var>
target:
もしや、我は死んでいる……の、か？
あぁ、兄上、俺も終わりらし……い……

source:
Run, run, run!
None can quench firelit spear!
target:
我が槍の炎、は消させん、ぞ！
どけどけどけ、え！

source:
Brother, they doomed with no heali─
<var 1A 02 /var>Shhh! Keep tricksy secret to yourself<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
我が弟よ、奴らは死ぬ、ぞ！
そのとおりだ、兄上、回復せぬ限り、な！

source:
Sick ones make sickness, Brother!
<var 1A 02 /var>Ehehehe, so badly will they ache<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
病は病を呼ぶの、だ、我が弟、よ！
そして奴らは苦しむのだ、な、兄上！

target:
戦を呼ぶ者たちよ……
あくまで静寂を乱そうというのか……。

source: Rise to join in the chorus, my brothers!
target: 氷像の衛士よ、来たりて我が敵を討て！

source: Embrace the serenity... Renounce the hatreds that consume you...
target:
風よ、光よ、そのすべてを凍てつかせ、
世界に静寂をもたらせ！

source: And scatter them like dust in the wind...
target: 砕け散れ！　ダイアモンドダスト！

source: Forgive them, my beloved...
target: あぁ、愛しき竜よ……永遠に……

source: Guests? But <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> weren't invited! Well, no matter─you shall have a splendid performance all the same!
target:
オヤオヤ、招かれざる観客のご登場だゾ……？
せっかくだ、道化の妙技をお見せしヨウ！

source: I had th-thought to play you for fools─but none are more fool than I...
target:
なんとまぁ、ひどい舞台になったものダネ……
だが……いずれ必ず……

source: I spy with my giant eye...prey for the hunting!
target:
見える、見えるぞ……
愚かな獲物たちが見えるぞォ！

source:
Round and round the hand does go.
Who will it slaughter? Nobody knows!
target:
「死のルーレット」が回り始めた……
運命に見放されし者は誰ぞ！？

source: N-No, my fate is grown dark before my eye...
target:
見えぬ、見えぬぞ……
我が命運が……闇に包まれてゆく……。

source: Grrrrrrrrr!
target: グルルルルル……

source: In darkness, all is as one. Be it hope or despair, everything is mine to devour.
target:
闇の前に、すべては無意味……
希望も絶望も、私の糧となるのだ……。

source: The light of your world will fade amidst the darkness!
target:
闇に溶け、闇となりて、
世界を闇で包み込もうぞ……。

source: The void shall consume all that is!
target: 真の闇を！　すべてを包む闇を！

source: Darkness take you all!
target:
もう抑えられん……
真の闇に、溶けるがいい！

source:
You cannot overcome what does not exist!
Of darkness I am born...and to darkness I shall return!
target:
な、なんと、無を超える力が！？
だが、闇は闇へと還るのみ……！

source: Grrraaaaaawr!
target: グルアァァァァッ！！

source: Clear the <var 1A 02 /var>Agrius<var 1A 01 /var> hull
target: 崩れた構造体の突破

source: Deactivate the Garlean barriers
target: 封鎖の解除

source: Clear the ceruleum spill
target: 浮行ガス充填区の突破

source: Defeat ???
target: ???の撃破

source: Come, then. Thou shalt be weighed in the balances.
target:
小さき者よ、その魂に帯びた光……
我が幻体にて、見極めてくれよう！

source: Receive of my breath, and ye shall live once more.
target:
死の底に眠る子よ、
ひとときなれど、生の幻を見るがいい……。

source: Into thee I place my spirit. Rise, my child, and join in the chorus.
target:
ほう、人の身でありながら、よくやる……。
では、次なる子にも幻を見せるとしよう。

source: Come forth, children of my children, as a cloud to cover the land.
target:
舞えよ、眷属たち……
 白き風となりて、駆け抜けるがいい！

source: Hearken to me, mortal, and thou shalt know I am thy lord.
target: 我が力の一端、見せてやろうぞ！

source: Heh heh heh. So thou art gifted...
target:
ぬぅ、我が幻体に一歩も退かぬとは……
これが星に選ばれし者の力か……。

source: Come, then. Thou shalt be weighed in the balances.
target:
小さき者よ、その魂に帯びた光……
我が幻体にて、見極めてくれよう！

source: Into thee I place my spirit. Rise, my child, and join in the chorus.
target: 幻よ、ひとときなれど竜となり、羽ばたくがいい……。

source: I bid thee rise, my child, and join in the chorus once more.
target:
幻の子らよ、共に放て……！
天翔ける竜の息吹を！

source: How bold thy defiance.
target: ほう、人の身でありながら、よくやる……。

source: Yet full of fear is thy heart.
target: ならば、我が力の一端、見せてやろうぞ！

source: Heh heh heh. So thou art gifted...
target:
ぬぅ、我が幻体に一歩も退かぬとは……
これが星に選ばれし者の力か……。

source: Hearken to me, mortal, and thou shalt know I am thy lord.
target:
受けてみよ！
竜の始祖たる幻龍の息吹を……！

source: Fu... Fu... Fungaaahhh!
target: フ、フ、フ……フガ……！

source: Funga... Fungafunga...
target: フガッ……フガフガッ……。

source: Fuuunnn-gaaaaaahhh!!!
target: フンガーーーーーーーーーー！！

source: Fu... Fu... Fungaaahhh!
target: フン、フン、フンガーーー！

source: Defeat the demon tome
target: デモンズ・ブックウォールの撃破

source: Defeat Byblos
target: ビブロスの撃破

source: Defeat the Everliving Bibliotaph
target: ビブリオタフの撃破

source: I am undone...but my master's seal is broken!
target:
うごごご！　ここまでか……
だが、我が主の封印は、地下深くで解かれるのだ！

source: Argh, oil everywhere! You shall pay dearly, accursed mortals!
target:
油が回って……
うごごご！　小癪な奴らめ！

source:
I shall not toy with you as does Lahabrea!
Witness the terrible might of a true servant of Zodiark!
target:
俺はラハブレアの野郎と違って、甘くはないぜ！
ここで、すべてを終わらせてやる！

source:
Writhing powers of ruination!
From the deepest pits of the abyss I summon thee!
target: 暗き淵より湧きいずる力よ、我が元に集え！

source:
Insatiable hunger of the void!
Devour all light and return this world to perfect darkness!
target:
すべてを呑み込む深淵の存在よ……
光を喰らいて、闇へと還せ！　ダージャ！

source:
By Zodiark's name I command thee!
River of time, mire mine enemy in thy sluggish flow!
target:
戒律王の名の下に命じる！
時よ、我に従え！　エテンド！

source: You shall wither in the merciless embrace of eternity!
target: 時の牢獄の中で、恐怖に溺れて死ぬがいい！

source:
But...you are shorn of Her blessing!
How do you yet resist me!?
target:
なん……だと……！？
この俺が、押されている……！？

source:
Impossible!
Has he power over...time itself!?
target:
どういうこと……時の流れが……
乱れているとでもいうの！？

source: To my side, Enkidu! The battle is joined!
target: 行くぞ、エンキドウ……我が友よ！

source:
Owww! It hurts! It hurts!
Enkidu! Your master wants for succor!
target: やるじゃねぇか……エンキドウ、手当を頼むぜ！

source: Fight on, Enkidu, my ever faithful─hm!?
target: エンキドウ！　後はお前に任せたぜ！

source:
You'll get no quarter from me this time.
Have at thee!
target: これが本当、本気の……最後の戦いだぜ！

source:
You have some skill, I'll give you that...
But Gilgamesh has only just begun to fight!
target:
なかなかやるじゃねぇか！
だが……オレたちの戦いは、まだ始まったばかりだ！

source:
Most impressive!
Very well─I, too, shall fight with all my strength!
target:
じ、上等だ……よぉし！
ここからは、お互い出し惜しみはナシだぜ！？

source: No! The mighty Gilgamesh will not be defeated!
target: まだだ……まだ、戦いは終わっちゃいねぇ！！

source: Enkidu! Are the bonds of our friendship so fragile!?
target:
ありゃ……エンキドウ……？
置いてけぼりは、なしだぜー！？

source: We claim victory this day, or Ishgard falls! Accept the Fury into your heart, and defend this bridge with your life's blood!
target:
皇都の命運は、この一戦に掛かっている！
総員、戦神の化身となりて、「雲廊」を死守せよ！

source:
Slings and arrows shall avail us little against this foe.
Ready the cannons!
target:
生半可な攻撃では通用しないか！
「対竜カノン砲」の発射準備を急げ！

source:
They seek to swarm the healers!
Focus your attacks on the dragonflies!
target:
くっ、癒し手を狙うつもりか！
ドラゴンフライを、優先的に排除せよ！

source: Blast! They've broken through the second layer, but there are yet two more wards behind that! Fight on!
target:
魔法障壁が破られたか！
だが、まだ二層の障壁がある！　怯まず攻撃を続行せよ！

source:
Climb the tower, and man the dragonkiller!
Steady now! Time your shot!
target:
塔に登り、「対竜バリスタ」を使うのだ！
焦らず、タイミングを測れよ！

source:
A hit!
The monster felt that one, by the Fury!
target: 命中を確認！　いいぞ、効いている！

source:
Bah, a wasted bolt.
We'd best make the other dragonkillers count!
target:
くっ、外したか！
だが、「対竜バリスタ」は、あと2基ある！　次は決めるぞ！

source:
Biasts!
Don't let them rush the cannons!
target:
ビアストどもが、対竜カノン砲を狙っているぞ！
攻撃の要を守り抜け！

source: Another ward down! Bleed them! Bleed them for every step! Our defenses grow thin...
target:
またもや、破られたか！
残る魔法障壁は少ない、総員、死力を尽くすのだ！

source:
They mean to overwhelm us...
Prepare the snares! Slow their advance!
target:
ヤツめ、一気にケリをつけるつもりか！
拘束魔器を作動させ、攻撃を阻止せよ！

source: Well done!
target: いいぞ、よくぞやってくれた！

source:
Damn these Dravanian devils!
Keep faith, now! This battle is far from lost!
target:
しまった！　だが、まだだ！
動ける者は、諦めず攻撃を続行せよ！

source:
It dodged the bloody missile!
A creature of that size...
target:
なにっ、回避しただと！？
あの巨体で避けるとは……！

source:
Horde reinforcements have arrived!
Put down those aevis!
target:
敵増援の飛来を確認！
前衛は、エイビスを討ち漏らすな！

source:
The wards are destroyed! Pull back!
We make our final stand before the Arc of the Worthy!
target:
魔法障壁の突破を確認！
残る「聖徒門」が最後の砦だ！　何としても死守せよ！

source:
If it breathes, we are lost!
Use both the snares! Choke its throat closed!
target:
来るぞ！　ヤツにブレスを吐かせるな！
2基の拘束魔器で、首根っこを押さえつけてやれ！

source:
Now! To the dragonkiller!
Skewer the foul beast while it thrashes!
target:
よし、今だ！　ヤツがもがいている間に、
「対竜バリスタ」で串刺しにするのだ！

source: By all that is holy...
target: な、なんということだ……。

source:
A fine shot!
Now we finish this scaled demon once and for all!
target:
「対竜バリスタ」の命中を確認！
もう一押しだ！　総員攻撃、トドメを刺してやれ！

source:
More Dravanians have landed!
Slay those drakes before they reach the powder kegs!
target:
敵増援を確認！　ヤツらの狙いは、樽爆弾か！？
総員、ドレイクを排除せよ！

source:
Move away from the kegs!
You'll be caught in the blast!
target:
樽爆弾から離れろ！
爆発に巻き込まれるぞ！！

source: Now! Ignite the powder kegs!
target: 今だ！　樽爆弾に着火せよ！

source:
Hah! That inflicted some hurt!
Back into the fray!
target:
よし！　効いているぞ！
この調子で、攻撃を続行するのだ！

source: Bah! The timing was off...
target: チッ……タイミングが狂ったか！

source:
The Arc of the Worthy is at our backs!
May Halone grant us the strength to die well in its shadow!
target:
我らが背負う「聖徒門」こそが、最後の砦なのだ！
戦神ハルオーネよ、我らの剣に力を！

source: Daniffen's Collar is naught but dust on the Sea of Clouds. What hope now for Ishgard...?
target:
くっ、ダナフェンの首飾りは、雲海の塵となったか……。
皇都イシュガルドは、もうお終いだ……。

source:
Shout your triumph to the heavens, my friends!
This day belongs to Ishgard─and her blessed defenders!
target:
皆の者、鬨の声をあげよ！　我らは勝利したのだ！
皇都を救いし英雄たちに、戦神ハルオーネの祝福あれ！

source: Defeat Vishap
target: ヴィシャップの撃破

source: To the Arc of the Worthy
target: 聖徒門到達まで

source: Clear the outer training grounds
target: 外郭中庭の踏破

source: Topple the towering oliphant
target: オリファントの撃破

source: Clear the barracks
target: 騎兵詰所の踏破

source: Slay Ser Yuhelmeric
target: 剣光のユヘルメリックの撃破

source: Clear the keep
target: キープの踏破

source: Defeat Ser Adelphel
target: 蒼天騎士の撃破

source: Defeat Ser Grinnaux
target: 蒼天騎士の撃破

source: Defeat Ser Charibert
target: 蒼天騎士の撃破

source: I trust you know your lives are forfeit.
target:
教皇庁に楯突くとは、いけませんね……。
蒼天騎士アデルフェルが、お相手いたしましょう。

source: I'll cut you to pieces!
target:
来たか……決闘裁判での借り、ここで返すぞッ！
貴様らまとめて、ミンチにしてやる！

source: Filthy rats!
target:
ドブネズミめ！
素晴らしい力を、見せつけてアゲる！

source: And now the final curtain!
target:
そろそろ幕引きネ！
我が魔法の味、たっぷり味わいなサイ！

source: This shall be a mercy!
target: 始末してあげまショウ！

source: What!? No... NO!
target:
まさか力を使ってまで、
圧倒されるだなんテ……！

source: Clear the history gallery
target: 第III展示区へ到達

source: Defeat the phantom ray
target: ファントムレイの撃破

source: Clear the soldiery gallery
target: 特級キメラ培養室へ到達

source: Defeat the minotaur
target: ミノタウロスの撃破

source: Clear a route to the security deck
target: 博物戦艦防衛デッキへの進路確保

source: Activate the violet control unit
target: バイオレット制御装置を操作

source: Activate the crimson control unit
target: クリムゾン制御装置を操作

source: Activate the emerald control unit
target: エメラルド制御装置を操作

source:
Warning!
Unauthorized personnel detected.
Initiating emergency reality augmentation protocol.
target:
博物戦艦・収蔵システムより警告……
侵入者排除のため、現実拡張を開始します！

source:
Repository node system failure imminent.
Disabling reality augmentation protocol.
target:
収蔵システムに異常……
現実拡張を……停止……します……

source: Bloodlust
target: 闘志

source: Dance to the song of ringing steel!
target:
さあ、語り合おうぞ……
武によってな！

source: Furious as a blaze!
target:
火の構え……
攻め押し通る！

source: Unyielding as the earth!
target:
土の構え……
易々とは崩せぬぞ！

source: Take wing, ye souls of war!
target: 舞えよ、胡蝶！　兵共の魂よ！

source: Prepare thyself!
target: 心して覚悟せよ！

source: Rejoice in the glory of combat!
target: 武の神髄！　チャンドラハース！

source: Thou hast bested me...
target: 我が武を、超えるか……。

source: Rejoice in the glory of combat!
target: 武の神髄！　チャンドラハース！

source: Clear the Aery exterior
target: エアリー・エクステリアの突破

source: Defeat Rangda
target: ランダの撃破

source: Clear the Aery interior
target: エアリー・インテリアの突破

source: Defeat Gyascutus
target: グヤスクトゥスの撃破

source: Clear Errn Scorh
target: エルン・スコールの突破

source:
Have I come so far just to die...?
Nidhogg... Damn you...
target:
こんなところで……殺られるのか……？
俺は……ニーズヘッグを……！

source: Estinien's Vitality
target: エスティニアンの体力

source:
I will enfeeble the wyrm with the Eye!
You must strike whilst he is weak!
target:
俺が「竜の眼」を使って、ヤツの力を押さえ込む！
その隙に、攻撃するんだ！

source:
Impudent mortal!
Thou wouldst use mine own eye against me!?
target: 我が眼の力を用いるとは、小賢しい真似を……！

source:
Attend me, my kindred!
Slay these treacherous children of man!
target:
来たれ、我が眷属！
裏切りの血族を、根絶やしにせよ！

source:
My patience for your incessant struggling doth falter.
Succumb now to the might of a great wyrm!
target:
あくまで抗うか……なれば、この眼の力を解き放つのみ！
七大天竜の力に、恐れひれ伏せ……！

source:
Such unthinkable power... I must use the Eye to shield us!
Protect me whilst I draw forth its strength!
target:
なんて莫大な魔力……クソッ、「竜の眼」で結界を張るぞ！
力を引き出す間、俺を護ってくれ！

source: 'Tis done! I am prepared!
target: 待たせたな！　結界を張るッ！

source:
Loathsome vermin!
You shall wither in the furnace of my wrath!
target:
忌まわしき罪人の血族よ、
我が慟哭の炎に焼かれ、消え去るがいい！

source: Treacherous mortals!
target: おのれ……こざかしい……！

source: Vengeance!
target: 憤怒こそ、我が力！

source: To the abyss with you!
target: 消し飛べっ！

source: My rage will consume you!
target: 千年の怒りをここに！

source: Tremble at my fury!
target: 我が咆吼に震えよ！

source:
Impudent mortal!
Thou wouldst use mine own eye against me!?
target: 我が眼の力を用いるとは、小賢しい真似を……！

source:
Attend me, my kindred!
Slay these treacherous children of man!
target:
来たれ、我が眷属！
裏切りの血族を、根絶やしにせよ！

source: My rage will consume you!
target: 千年の怒りをここに！

source: Tremble at my fury!
target: 我が咆吼に震えよ！

source: Treacherous mortals!
target: おのれ……こざかしい……！

source: Clear Analysis and Proving
target: 試作機実験庫の突破

source: Clear Bioweapon Research
target: 生体兵器研究棟の突破

source: Defeat Harmachis
target: ハルマキスの撃破

source: Defeat all opposition
target: 立ちはだかる脅威の撃破

source: Defeat the Ascian Prime
target: アシエン・プライムの撃破

source: Intruders detected. Releasing bioweapons.
target:
侵入者ヲ検知……
培養中ノ生体兵器ニテ応戦シマス

source:
Releasing additional bioweapons.
All personnel, please proceed calmly to the nearest exit.
target:
生体兵器ヲ追加投入シマス
職員ハタダチニ退避シテクダサイ

source: Intruders detected. Releasing bioweapons.
target:
侵入者ヲ検知……
培養中ノ生体兵器ニテ応戦シマス

source:
Releasing additional bioweapons.
All personnel, please proceed calmly to the nearest exit.
target:
生体兵器ヲ追加投入シマス
職員ハタダチニ退避シテクダサイ

source: No sooner do I clear away the rabble...
target:
ようやくガラクタ掃除が終わったと思えば……
やれやれ、ここで再会するとはな。

source: Let's get this over with, shall we?
target:
遭遇したからには捨て置けんか……
行くぞ、蛮族の英雄よ！

source: Turrets, deploy!
target: 小賢しい蛮族が！　行け、タレット！

source:
Your reputation is well deserved.
Very well, let us try something different.
target:
さすがはガイウス軍団長を屠った英雄か！
ガンバスタードの力を解放する！

source: The day is yours...but we will meet again.
target:
チッ、さすがに手強いか……
ここは退かせてもらおう……またいずれな！

source:
Activating Harmachis.
Commencing bioweapon assessment.
target:
キメラ生物性能評価システム
「ハルマキス」起動……

source: Engaging anti-cobra mode.
target:
次ノ評価項目ヘ移行……
対コブラ戦評価ヲ開始シマス

source: Anti-cobra testing complete.
target: 対コブラ戦評価項目ヲ終了

source: Engaging anti-naga mode.
target:
次ノ評価項目ヘ移行……
対キメラ戦評価ヲ開始シマス

source: Anti-naga testing complete.
target: 対キメラ戦評価項目ヲ終了

source: Engaging anti-machina mode.
target:
次ノ評価項目ヘ移行……
対機械兵器戦評価ヲ開始シマス

source: Anti-machina testing complete.
target: 対機械兵器戦評価項目ヲ終了

source:
Assessment complete. Result: Outstanding.
Subject approved for mass production.
target:
評価終了……コノ試作兵器ハ極メテ優秀デス
タダチニ量産開始ヲ進言シマス！

source: Come! We settle this once and for all!
target: 光の使徒め、ここで決着をつけてくれる……！

source: Mortal scum! I will entomb you in ice!
target:
俗物が……！
我が氷結魔法で消し去ってくれよう！

source: Let us see you withstand two magicks at once!
target:
ならば、これはどうだ！
ふたつの魔法を融合させるッ……！

source: Fires of creation─arise!
target: 創造の火よ、熾れ……！

source: My magicks flow as one!
target: 我の魔力、ひとつに束ね融合させる……！

source: Ahhh, the power of Darkness surges... Tranquil as ice, vicious as fire!
target:
炎のように激しく、氷のように静かに、
闇の力が猛るのを感じるぞ……！

source: Feel the might of our magicks combined!
target: 多重詠唱……すべてを融合させるッ！

source: Not even the laws of creation can withstand the tides of chaos!
target: 世の理すら、混沌に沈めてくれる……！

source: Stubborn mortals... Very well, we will show you our true strength!
target: まだ抗うか……ならば、我が魔法の極みを見せてくれる！

source: Know eternal despair! Fire and ice consume you!
target: 炎と氷の混沌に呑まれ、絶望とともに眠れ！

source: Even without the blessing of Light... How is this possible!?
target:
馬鹿な……
光の加護なくして、耐え抜いただと……！？

source: Our might knows no bounds!
target: 我らが力、とくと見るがよい……！

You dare intrude upon this sacred mount!?
My jaws shall run red with the blood of men!
target:
ヒトが、聖なる山を穢すというのか！
我がアギトで、噛み砕いてくれようぞ！

source:
Arrogant insects!
Be crushed beneath the weight of my fury!
target: 小賢しいヒトどもめ、我が怒りを受けるがいい！

source:
Nidhogg, my beloved...
Avenge me...
target:
あぁ……ニーズヘッグ……
愛しき翼よ……我は……。

source: Your feeble light shall fade before my brilliance!
target:
神に抗う光の使徒よ……
その異能の力を、我が光によって打ち消してくれるわ！

target:
「竜の眼」を喰らいし聖剣アスカロンよ……
この地に眠る、微睡みの神より力を引き出せ！

source: I shall end your vain struggle!
target:
ほう、よく耐えおるわ……
だが、どこまで耐えていられるかな！？

source: Y-You survived my divine reckoning!? Impossible!
target:
馬鹿なッ……神が導く終焉に耐え抜くだと！？
ならん、あってはならんぞ、こんな事はッ！！

source: This is the power of Light?
target: これが、光の力だと……千年の祈りが……。

source:
You think to withstand the fury of my divine will?
Kneel now before the unfettered glory of the Eye!
target:
ほう、神が導く終焉に耐えてみせたか！
ならば、「眼」より究極の力を解放するまでよ！

Long has it been since last I feasted...

ククク……恐怖ノ香リガスルゾ……
久方ブリノ、晩餐トイコウカ……。

source: My minions shall infest your world!
target: 裂ケヨ、開ケヨ、暗キ穴ヨ！

source:
I gorge upon fear, and spew it forth as bile!
All shall be tainted with pestilence!
target:
恐怖ヲ喰ライテ、不浄ノ膿ヲ吐キ出サン！
全テヲ、染メヨ、ペスティレンス！

No! This cannot be...
I am endless, as the stars...

ソンナ馬鹿ナコトガ……。

Meddling mortals...
Arise and taste vengeance, my ravenous kindred!
target: 忌々しき人どもめ……目覚めよ、我が同胞たち！

source:
You would intrude upon the queen's very bedchamber?
Only agonizing death can cure such temerity!
target:
我らが主の臥所に押し入るとは……
その愚行を、悔いるがいい！

source: Such plump souls, ready for the harvest!
target: 貴様らの魂、刈り取ってくれる！

source: Your fate shall be throttled in serpents' coils!
target: 我が爪よ、分裂し大蛇となれ！

source: Return to me, my wayward claws!
target: 融合せよ、そして我が爪となれ！

source:
Come, my children.
There is mortal blood to spill!
target: 我が子らよ……剣を以て、討ち倒せッ！

source: My queen! May your shadow fall over all...

ゲコゲコゲーコ！　ワレは塔の番人ゲコ！
久しぶりの侵入者、ノドが鳴るゲコォ！！

Pestilent northerners...
You shall regret the decision to loosen my fetters!
target:
増長せし北方人どもめ……
我が枷を解いたこと、後悔させてくれよう！

source:
The equilibrium of life...
I shall tip thy scales and partake of thy bounteous energy!
target:
均衡の力……
大地に満ちる生命を傾け、我に注げ！

source:
Patience and penance...
For millennia have I yearned to enact this vengeance!
target:
峻厳の力……
今こそ真の姿となりて、神罰を下さん！

source:
I am the end and the beginning!
By my touch shall your wretched lives be blessed!
target:
これが生命の樹……
大いなる自然の前に、屈服するがいい！

source:
I am the incarnation of life!
I cannot perish...cannot wither...
target:
グオオオオオオオ……
我が生命が……尽きるというのか……！

source:
To die here is a mercy...
You shall not witness your lands when I rend them asunder!
target:
慈悲の力……
ここで滅するのは、せめてもの情けよ！

source:
You have dimmed my boundless light.
What power of death do you mortals wield...?
target:
我が無限光を凌ぐとは驚いた……。
称えよう、その力……死して巡る価値ある命よ！

I am the steward of life in Amdapor!
By the order of the magi, all who trespass shall perish!
target:
我は古都の守護者なり！
白魔道士会の命により、侵略者を誅殺せん！

source:
Life passes unto death.
By the grace of the magi, I shall rise again!
target:
生は死に、死は生へと巡るならば、
生命の理、今こそ反転せよ！　リバース！

source:
Even stone is blighted by the rasping of the wind.
By the mercy of the magi, my wounds be cured!
target:
波動に揺れる大気……
その風の腕で傷つける命を癒やせ！　ケアルジャ！

source:
Even rock is diminished by the gnawing of the waves.
By the bounty of the magi, my form be restored!
target:
波動に乱れる大気……
その風の腕で満ちる命を蝕め！　ケアルジャ！

source:
The enemy is too great...
Flee, my magi masters─flee and rebuild...

オオオ……古都の民よ……
逃げよ、逃げて再起を……。

source:
Amdapor...is...sacred.
It will not...be...despoiled...
target:
アムダプール、ハ、シンセイナル、ミヤコ……
カナラズヤ、マモリトオス……。

source:
This...cannot...be...
My purpose...is failed...

ナントイウ、コトナノダ……

コフォ……コフォ……これより公開処刑を開始する！
X号ゴブリフライヤーの威力を見るがいい！

source: Quickthinx is done toying with uplanders!
target:
コフォ……コフォ……小手調べもここまで！
覚悟するがいい、愚民ども！

target:
コフォ……コフォ……シャノアちゃん！
処刑ショーを観戦に来たのだな！？

コフォ……コフォ……ま、まさか……

source: Forward, forward! Ishgard! Ishgard!
target: 開戦だ、行くぞッ！

source: The Fury's Gaze is upon us!
target: 「戦術目標」が選出されたか……！

source: Come, Ishgardians! Show us your mettle!
target:
イシュガルド軍よ、全力で来い！
その一撃で、貴国を我らに知らしめよ！

三国同盟軍も懸命だ……！
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、戦術目標の「ルキア」を護ってくれ！

source: Victory is within our grasp! Ishgard! Ishgard!
target:
よし、よく凌いでくれた！
イシュガルドの勝利まで、あと少しだ！

source: Stand fast, brothers and sisters! Ishgard! Ishgard!
target:
くっ、ルキアがやられたか……。
だが終わりではない、勝つぞ！

source: Aye, that's the spirit! Flames, Adders, Maelstrom─forward!
target:
その意気やよし！
三国同盟軍よ、我らも今こそ奮起せよ！

source: The Fury's Gaze has fallen upon...General Raubahn and...
target:
戦術目標が変わった！
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>と、ラウバーン殿だと……！？
